hero.title: Empowering African Tech Innovation
hero.subtitle: Building the future through open-source solutions and global developer communities
hero.description: Jarida connects African tech talent with global opportunities, fostering innovation through collaborative open-source projects that solve real-world problems.

about.title: Our Mission
about.subtitle: Bridging Africa and Global Tech
about.description: Jarida is more than a platform—it's a movement. We believe in the power of African innovation to transform the world, and we're committed to providing the tools, community, and opportunities to make it happen.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We prioritize cutting-edge solutions that address real-world challenges

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Every project is built by and for the developer community

impact.title: Global Impact
impact.description: Local solutions with the potential to transform industries worldwide

open.title: Open Source
open.description: Transparent, collaborative development for maximum impact and trust

ksl.title: Kenyan Sign Language Translator
ksl.description: Breaking down communication barriers with AI-powered sign language translation for the Kenyan deaf community.

healthcare.title: Rural Healthcare Connect
healthcare.description: Telemedicine platform connecting rural communities with healthcare professionals across Africa.

education.title: Digital Learning Hub
education.description: Offline-first educational platform for areas with limited internet connectivity.

community.title: Join Our Global Community
community.subtitle: Connect, Collaborate, Create
community.description: Be part of a vibrant ecosystem of developers, designers, and innovators working together to solve Africa's biggest challenges.

values.title: Inclusive Innovation
values.description: We welcome contributors from all backgrounds and skill levels

values.title: Knowledge Sharing
values.description: Learning together through mentorship and collaboration

values.title: Real Impact
values.description: Every line of code contributes to meaningful solutions

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Comprehensive guides and API references for all projects

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guides for new contributors and developers

blog.title: Tech Blog
blog.description: Insights, stories, and updates from the African tech ecosystem

apis.title: APIs & SDKs
apis.description: Developer tools and libraries for building on our platform

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to make an impact?
contact.description: Whether you're a developer, organization, or simply passionate about African tech innovation, we'd love to hear from you.
